definition.text: Superalgos is a Community project! We make the software available to everyone free-of-charge, but we do ask for something in return... your help!

paragraphs.text: How can Superalgos be free? What's the catch?
We get those questions often! The story is...

Superalgos started with a group of friends joining forces to automate their crypto trading. They realized early on that to compete with top market players on a level field, a huge software infrastructure was required. The system needed to be on par or better than commercial and proprietary software available to firms. Such requirements could not be fulfilled by a small team in a reasonable timeframe.
